greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = coefficient of z^n*w^k in 1/(1 - 2*z - 2*w + 2*z*w) read by rows in order 00, 10, 01, 20, 11, 02, ...
comment: Pascal-like triangle: start with 1 at top; every subsequent entry is the sum of everything above you, plus 1.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows, flattened
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Sum[(-1)^j*2^(n + k - j)*Binomial[n, j]*Binomial[n + k - j, n], {j, 0, n}]; Table[T[n - k, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 04 2017 *)
xref: See A059576 for a similar triangle.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 03, 2001; revised Jun 12 2005
